hooked.translation[0].definitions[0].def: curved outwards or shaped like a hook
hooked.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if you are hooked on a drug, you feel a strong need for it and you cannot stop taking it
hooked.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I know a girl who got hooked on cocaine.
hooked.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if you are hooked on something, you enjoy it very much and you want to do it as often as possible
hooked.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: I got hooked on TV when I was sick.
